extension.title: Posts RSS feed
extension.description: Adds a posts RSS feed to forums.
extension.author: PunBB Development Team
extension.note: Warning! This extension has been tested and optimized for MySQL database. Installing this extension on a forum that uses PostgreSQL or SQLite may lead to performance descrease.

hooks.hook: $forum_page['main_head_options']['feed'] = ''.$lang_pun_posts_feed['RSS topics feed'].''; $forum_page['main_head_options']['posts feed'] = ''.$lang_pun_posts_feed['RSS posts feed'].'';
